DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect consumption sugar-sweetened beverage blood triglyceride cholesterol , cholesterol concentration , body 's sensitivity insulin .
DOC.brief_title: The Metabolic Effects Consuming Sugar-Sweetened Beverages Two Weeks
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective , blind diet intervention study participant consume either fructose- HFCS-sweetened beverage ( provide 10 % , 17.5 % 25 % energy ) meal . In addition , two control group , one group consume 0 % sugar beverage sweeten sucralose consume glucose-sweetened beverage 25 % energy requirement . Experimental procedure , include 24-hour serial blood sampling , post-heparin infusion , gluteal biopsy , Magnetic Resonance Imaging liver abdomen , Oral Glucose Tolerance Disposal Tests , perform baseline end 2-week intervention period UC Davis Clinical Translational Science Center ( CTSC ) Clinical Research Center ( CCRC ) . During inpatient period , subject serve energy balance diet . The diet provide 15 % energy protein , 30 % fat , 55 % carbohydrate . During baseline testing , carbohydrate content consist primarily complex carbohydrate ( > 97 % ) . During intervention 55 % carbohydrate consist 10 % sugar/45 % complex , 17.5 % sugar/37.5 % complex , 25 % sugar/30 % complex depend diet group subject assign . During outpatient intervention period , subject reside home provide fructose- HFCS -sweetened beverage consume meal along self-selected ad libitum ( usual ) diet .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 1835 Self report stable body weight past six month Diabetes Mellitus Evidence liver disorder Evidence kidney disorder Evidence thyroid disorder Systolic blood pressure consistently 160mmHg diastolic blood pressure 900mmHg Triglycerides > 400mg/dl LDLC > 240mg/dl Hemoglobin < 8.5 g/dl Current , prior ( within 2 month ) , anticipate use hypolipidemic antidiabetic agent Use Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors antihypertensive medication Any condition , opinion investigator , would put subject risk Strenuous exerciser Pregnant lactate woman Smoker Diet exclusion : food allergy , special dietary restriction , habitual ingest > 2 alcoholic beverages/day
